titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Speeches in the Records of the Office of the President (Dr. John Brademas) RG 3.0.10

did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the President (Brademas), Speeches
did.physloc: This collection is in offsite storage. Please contact the repository for access.
did.abstract: This collection contains addresses given by John Brademas while serving as President of New York University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The files are grouped into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains addresses given by Dr. John Brademas, President of New York University from 1981 to 1991. Most date from the tenure of his presidency, although a few predate it. The speeches are arranged in chronological order from 1965 to 1991.

bioghist.head: Biography of John Brademas
bioghist.p: John Brademas, now President Emeritus of New York University, served as President from 1981 to 1992. During that time, he led the transition of NYU from a regional commuter school to a national and international residential research university. Before coming to New York, he served as U.S. Representative in Congress from Indiana for 22 years (1959-81), the last four as House Majority Whip. In Congress he earned a reputation for his leadership in education and the arts. Former Chairman of the President's Committee on the Arts and the Humanities, the National Endowment for Democracy and the Board of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York, he is president of the King Juan Carlos I of Spain Center of New York University Foundation. He is a Fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and member of the National Academy of Education (USA), The Academy of Athens, European Academy of Science and Arts and National Academy of Education of Argentina. In 2004 he was elected to the New York State Board of Regents by the New York State Legislature.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2641
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: university.archives@library.nyu.edu

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Speeches given before the Board of Trustees of New York University will be restricted for thirty-five years from the date of delivery.

Additionally, this collection is in
off-site storage .
